topic.title: Changing the Color Theme of WebHelp Pages

body.p: You can change the color theme for your WebHelp pages by customizing the colors in a CSS stylesheet and configuring a few parameters for the WebHelp transformation scenario.

To change the color theme of WebHelp pages, use the following procedure:
Create a custom color theme in a CSS stylesheet.You can use a designer tool, such as the ThemeRoller for jQuery Mobile, to create your own custom theme and then download the resulting CSS stylesheet to use for your WebHelp pages.
Edit the WebHelp transformation scenario and open the Parameters tab.
Specify the path of your custom CSS file as the value of the args.css parameter.
Set the value of the args.copycss parameter to yes.
